stories.Title: SREday in London
stories.Description: Don't miss SREday in London on 14-15 September! Experience the best of Site Reliability Engineering with over 50+ talks delivered by the best in the field. Secure your early bird tickets now!
stories.Tweet: SREday in London 📦 Don't miss SREday in London on 14-15 September! Experience the best of Site Reliability Engineering with over 50+ talks delivered by the best in the field. Secure your early bird tickets now! #SRE https://sreday.com/?unpack

stories.Title: AI advancements in healthcare
stories.Description: Amazon Web Services has announced AWS HealthScribe. A service that leverages generative AI and speech recognition to automate clinical documentation, reducing the administrative workload for doctors.
stories.Tweet: AI advancements in healthcare 📦 Amazon Web Services has announced AWS HealthScribe. A service that leverages generative AI and speech recognition to automate clinical documentation, reducing the administrative workload for doctors. #amazon https://www.cnbc.com/2023/07/26/aws-announces-generative-ai-tool-to-save-doctors-time-on-paperwork.html

stories.Title: Shopify presents: Sidekick
stories.Description: With Shopify's new conversational AI assistant, merchants can streamline tasks, generate content, and gain valuable insights. A feature expected to contribute to the growth of their businesses.
stories.Tweet: Shopify presents: Sidekick 📦 With Shopify's new conversational AI assistant, merchants can streamline tasks, generate content, and gain valuable insights. A feature expected to contribute to the growth of their businesses. #shopify https://techcrunch.com/2023/07/26/shopify-sidekick-is-like-chatgpt-but-for-ecommerce-merchants/

stories.Title: Stability AI unveils SDXL 1.0
stories.Description: The latest Stable Diffusion model is here. Enjoy improved image quality, vibrant colors, and a powerful fine-tuning feature for highly detailed images using a simple text prompt.
stories.Tweet: Stability AI unveils SDXL 1.0 📦 The latest Stable Diffusion model is here. Enjoy improved image quality, vibrant colors, and a powerful fine-tuning feature for highly detailed images using a simple text prompt. #ai https://venturebeat.com/ai/stability-ai-levels-up-image-generation-launch-new-stable-diffusion-base-model/

stories.Title: Nuclear boost for space travel
stories.Description: Lockheed Martin has joined forces with NASA and DARPA to create a spacecraft with nuclear thermal propulsion. An ambitious project with potential implications for faster and more agile space missions.
stories.Tweet: Nuclear boost for space travel 📦 Lockheed Martin has joined forces with NASA and DARPA to create a spacecraft with nuclear thermal propulsion. An ambitious project with potential implications for faster and more agile space missions. #NASA https://www.engadget.com/nasa-picks-lockheed-martin-to-build-the-nuclear-rocket-thatll-take-us-to-mars-170035659.html

stories.Title: Another obstacle to Boeing's Starliner
stories.Description: Despite facing financial challenges with a $257M loss on the CST-100 Starliner program, Boeing stays firmly committed to safety as they resolve technical issues for a successful launch.
stories.Tweet: Another obstacle to Boeing's Starliner 📦 Despite facing financial challenges with a $257M loss on the CST-100 Starliner program, Boeing stays firmly committed to safety as they resolve technical issues for a successful launch. #boeing https://spacenews.com/boeing-records-more-losses-from-starliner-delays/

stories.Title: Try again later Falcon Heavy
stories.Description: Falcon Heavy's seventh launch takes an unexpected turn as the countdown halts with 65 seconds to go. Stay tuned for the rescheduled liftoff tonight.
stories.Tweet: Try again later Falcon Heavy 📦 Falcon Heavy's seventh launch takes an unexpected turn as the countdown halts with 65 seconds to go. Stay tuned for the rescheduled liftoff tonight. #spacex https://www.space.com/spacex-scrub-falcon-heavy-launch-july-26

stories.Title: Bye-bye Aeolus
stories.Description: On Friday, July 28, Aeolus is set to reenter Earth's atmosphere. ESA's Space Operations Centre in Germany is taking charge, closely monitoring and guiding the satellite throughout the process.
stories.Tweet: Bye-bye Aeolus 📦 On Friday, July 28, Aeolus is set to reenter Earth's atmosphere. ESA's Space Operations Centre in Germany is taking charge, closely monitoring and guiding the satellite throughout the process. #ESA https://interestingengineering.com/innovation/assisted-reentry-esas-satellite-likely-to-fall-over-atlantic-ocean-on-july-28

stories.Title: Houston, we had a power outage!
stories.Description: NASA's Mission Control experienced a power outage in Houston, resulting in losing communication with the ISS. Backup control systems were promptly activated, resolving the issue in 90 minutes.
stories.Tweet: Houston, we had a power outage! 📦 NASA's Mission Control experienced a power outage in Houston, resulting in losing communication with the ISS. Backup control systems were promptly activated, resolving the issue in 90 minutes. #NASA https://www.theguardian.com/science/2023/jul/26/iss-power-outage-nasa-contact-international-space-station-backup-systems

stories.Title: Into the depths of space
stories.Description: The James Webb Space Telescope showcases the marvelous spectacle of actively forming stars, Herbig-Haro 46/47, in the Vela Constellation, located 1,470 light-years away.
stories.Tweet: Into the depths of space 📦 The James Webb Space Telescope showcases the marvelous spectacle of actively forming stars, Herbig-Haro 46/47, in the Vela Constellation, located 1,470 light-years away. #NASA https://www.nasa.gov/feature/goddard/2023/webb-snaps-highly-detailed-infrared-image-of-actively-forming-stars

stories.Title: A charging revolution
stories.Description: In a groundbreaking move, BMW Group, GM, Honda, Hyundai, Kia, Mercedes-Benz Group, and Stellantis NV have come together to establish a new charging network in North America.
stories.Tweet: A charging revolution 📦 In a groundbreaking move, BMW Group, GM, Honda, Hyundai, Kia, Mercedes-Benz Group, and Stellantis NV have come together to establish a new charging network in North America. #EVs https://electrek.co/2023/07/26/auto-giants-unite-build-universal-network-clean-energy-fast-charger-north-america/

stories.Title: Apple calls for action!
stories.Description: The fourth beta of iOS 17 reveals clues about the rumored "Action" button on iPhone 15 Pro and ‌iPhone 15 Pro‌ Max. Code snippets suggest potential customizable options.
stories.Tweet: Apple calls for action! 📦 The fourth beta of iOS 17 reveals clues about the rumored "Action" button on iPhone 15 Pro and ‌iPhone 15 Pro‌ Max. Code snippets suggest potential customizable options. #apple https://www.macrumors.com/2023/07/26/ios-17-beta-action-button-iphone-15-pro/
